message.name: TRAJECTORY
message.description: Trajectory reference point message. Might contain still points that should be excluded from actual followed trajectory, but the points will have a stillness flag set. Extends GLOBAL_POSITION_INT
message.field: Indicates type of the trajectory reference point. Currently 0 is for "still point" and 1 is for "valid point".
Altitude in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters), WGS84 (not AMSL)
Altitude above ground in meters, expressed as * 1000 (millimeters)
Ground X Speed (Latitude), expressed as m/s * 100
Ground Y Speed (Longitude), expressed as m/s * 100
Ground Z Speed (Altitude), expressed as m/s * 100
Compass heading in degrees * 100, 0.0..359.99 degrees. If unknown, set to: UINT16_MAX
